data.rationale:
This module extends the already existent Term::Screen module with
    readline functionality. The readline functionality has a lot of
    functionality that can be used to alter the readline behaviour.
    Functionality includes:

    - Input validation - Character conversion - Key EXIT definitions -
    Display Length vs. Line Length. - Password input - Default values -
    Screen positioning (at(row,col)).
